info.name: Torn: Left Aligned
info.description: This simple css clip overrides Torn.com's centered-by-default style by defining a left margin.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0.1: Added !important to the rule, because a new change to header.min.css overrode the custom rule on index.php
Version 1.0: Exactly as provided originally.  Many thanks to Mauk[1494436]
